name: A Simple Delivery
description:
The King has tasked his best mailman to go to the Wizard's tower to help cure his fatal disease. Can you make the simple delivery? This was made as part of the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 

Controls:

A = Move Left

D = Move Right

Space = Jump (You can hold to jump higher)

Shift = Run

This was our first game jam!

Created by:

Alex Pohlman (Music, Level Design, Coding)

Anthony Yoon (Art, Sound)

Presley Duggan (Coding, Level Design, Sound, Art)

Tristan Wilkins (Art, Theme, Dialogue)
